Desc.entry: Runs minibuses on set routes, on set days, for shopping trips for disabled, frail and elderly people in Sheffield. The service operates for 5 days a week to the city centre, Crystal Peaks and neighbourhood supermarkets. All buses are equipped with wheelchair access, low steps and will collect and return passengers to and from their home address. Before using the service passengers must register and confirm their eligibility. Bookings must be made 1 day in advance before 12.30pm. One companion may travel with each eligible passenger.
